The second half was flatter, although Eamon Gilmore got a couple of decent tackles in towards the end, pointing out that Micheál Martin commissioned 140 different reports as Health Minister, and then delivered a good shot. You're approaching this election on the basis of hard neck; you're trying to pretend that Fianna Fail wasn't in government at all for the last 14 years. Eamon Gilmore was perfectly correct of course. But Micheál Martin 's neck is harder than he thought. The result? Micheál Martin 1, though he was getting a bit too cocky near the final whistle,
